mapper.select: SELECT sn, msg_cn as msgCn, rcptn_rgn_nm as rcptnRgnNm, crt_dt as crtDt, reg_ymd as regYmd, emeg_step_nm as emegstepNm, dst_se_nm as dstSeNm, mdfcn_ymd as mdfcnYmd FROM safety_message WHERE sn = #{sn}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO safety_message ( sn, msg_cn, rcptn_rgn_nm, crt_dt, reg_ymd, emeg_step_nm, dst_se_nm, mdfcn_ymd ) VALUES ( #{sn}, #{msgCn}, #{rcptnRgnNm}, #{crtDt}, #{regYmd}, #{emegstepNm}, #{dstSeNm}, #{mdfcnYmd} )
mapper.update: UPDATE safety_message SET msg_cn = #{msgCn}, rcptn_rgn_nm = #{rcptnRgnNm}, crt_dt = #{crtDt}, reg_ymd = #{regYmd}, emeg_step_nm = #{emegstepNm}, dst_se_nm = #{dstSeNm}, mdfcn_ymd = #{mdfcnYmd} WHERE sn = #{sn}
